meanings: [명사] vitalization, invigoration, energization, [동사] vitalize, invigorate, energize

vlive.korean: 유니콘 기능도 활성화가 되고요. You can become a unicorn. 듣기 View video ASTRO : 100만돌파~~~다시돌파~!!😁😁😁
피부를 활성화 시켜줘요. It also helps to activate the skin. 듣기 View video Wishtrend TV : Why Do Korean Girls Look So Young? | Korean Anti Aging Skin Care Tips | Wishtrend TV
vlive.english: It also helps to activate the skin.

vlive.korean: 뜨겁게 활성화되는 것 같은 그런 느낌이 막 나요. feels like it's revitalized. 듣기 View video 포토피플(PHOTO PEOPLE) : 포토피플 in TOKYO 8부_ep.3 신나는 토요일 불타는 이밤 유후~
조금 잘 활성화 되어있어. - 그냥 언어 자체에 약간... You are well activated in it. - Just in the language itself... 듣기 View video GFRIEND : 오사카 밤밤밤에~💫

vlive.korean: 열로 인해서 트리트먼트 효과가 활성화가 돼요. The heat from the dryer activates the treatment qualities of this product. 듣기 View video V Beauty : [박서울x살롱드부띠끄] 레드벨벳 아이린 토끼피부/여신머리 배워보자!! [Redvelvet Irene]
vlive.english: The heat from the dryer activates the treatment qualities of this product.

examples.korean: They are looking into ways of invigorating the department. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그들은 그 부서를 활성화할 방안을 찾고 있다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: They are looking into ways of invigorating the department. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The women were given fertility drugs to stimulate the ovaries. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 여성들에게는 난소를 활성화시키는 배란 촉진제가 주어졌다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The women were given fertility drugs to stimulate the ovaries. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: They have created an environment in which productivity should flourish. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그들은 생산성이 활성화될 수 있는 환경을 조성했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: They have created an environment in which productivity should flourish. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The gene is activated by a specific protein. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 유전자는 특수 단백질에 의해 활성화된다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The gene is activated by a specific protein. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Eating little activates your sirtuins. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 소식하는 것이 여러분의 장수 유전자를 활성화합니다. 국제영어대학원대학교 신어사전
